MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole is still ongoing. This is due to on site difficulties and we now expect power to be back on by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.23pm on Tuesday, 10 November 2020.
